questions.standard_text: CCSS.ELA-LITERACY.L.9-10.3 (Apply knowledge of language to understand how language functions in different contexts, to make effective choices for meaning or style)
questions.question_text:
Read the following sentences: 
"The heavy rain fell for hours. The streets started to flood."

Which sentence best combines these two ideas to clearly show a cause-and-effect relationship?

choices.choice_text: Because the heavy rain fell for hours, the streets started to flood.
The heavy rain fell for hours, and the streets started to flood.
The streets started to flood; the heavy rain fell for hours.
After the heavy rain fell for hours, the streets started to flood.

questions.standard_text: CCSS.ELA-LITERACY.W.9-10.3 (Write narratives or develop real or imagined experiences or events using effective technique, well-chosen details)
questions.question_text: Describe a time you felt proud of something you accomplished. Use 2-3 sentences to express your feelings and explain why you were proud.

choices.choice_text: I felt very proud when I finished my first marathon. It was a difficult challenge, but I trained hard and pushed myself to the finish line. Crossing the finish line made me feel strong and accomplished.

questions.standard_text: CCSS.ELA-LITERACY.L.9-10.5 (Demonstrate understanding of word relationships, and nuances in word meanings)
questions.question_text: Read the sentence: "The old house stood on the hill." Which two words would best replace "old" to create a more vivid and descriptive image of the house? (Select two.)

questions.standard_text: CCSS.ELA-LITERACY.W.9-10.1 (Write arguments to support claims in an analysis of substantive topics, using valid reasoning and relevant evidence)
questions.question_text: Do you think it is important for students to learn a second language? Explain your opinion in 2-4 sentences, providing at least one reason to support your answer.

choices.choice_text: Yes, I believe it is very important for students to learn a second language. Learning another language can open up many opportunities for travel and work, and it also helps you understand different cultures better. It can also improve your cognitive skills.
